All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractBehavior
Provides an abstract implementation of the Behavior interface, tracking the number of frames since its activation and defining the lifecycle of a behavior.
AbstractRenderable
Abstract class representing a renderable component in the application.
AbstractTexture
This abstract class represents a texture in the application.
Animation
Represents an animation made up of multiple frames.
AnimationPlayer
The AnimationPlayer class is a component behavior that handles the playing of animations by updating the texture rectangle with the current frame.
Application
This class represents the main application.
ApplicationManager
ApplicationManager class manages the lifecycle of applications.
ApplicationModule
Enum representing the different application modules.
ApplicationPlatform
Represents the platform of the application, containing various managers.
ApplicationPlatformModuleException
 
AssetsCompressing
 
AssetsDecompressing
 
AudioManager
The AudioManager interface should be implemented by the specific platform running the application, it contains function for manipulation audio files.
AudioPlayer
The AudioPlayer class is a component behavior that allows for playing, pausing, and manipulating audio clips in a Yield application.
Axis
Represents an input axis with two keys for positive and negative directions.
Behavior
This interface represents a behavior that can be started and updated over time.
BlankScene
The BlankScene class is a custom scene for an application.
BodyType
 
BoxCollider2D
 
ChangeSceneTransition
 
CircleCollider2D
 
Collider2D
 
CollisionListener
 
Color
This class represents a color with RGB or ARGB format.
Color.Format
This enumeration is used to specify the format of the color value when creating a new `Color` object.
Colors
A utility class for defining and generating various color constants.
ComponentBehavior
Abstract class representing a behavior that can be attached to an Entity2D.
ComponentCreation
Represents a creation of a component with a specific behavior and modifier.
ComponentModifier
A functional interface that represents a modifier for a component's behavior.
Context
This class represents a context that runs a specified behavior at a specified frame-rate.
ContextTime
Represents the timing context for an application, encapsulating time-related properties such as delta time, timescale, and target sleep time.
DefaultFileIOManager
 
DistanceJoint2D
 
EdgeCollider2D
 
EmptyRenderable
This class represents an empty renderable object.
Entity2D
Represents a 2D entity within a game or application.
Entity2DContainer
This is a class that represents a container for Entity2Ds, allowing for instantiation and removal of entities.
Entity2DPrefab
The Entity2DPrefab class is a blueprint for creating 2D entities with components, children, and tags.
EntityStarter
This interface represents a starter for an entity of type Entity2D.
FileInput
This class represents a file input with its path and format.
FileIOManager
Interface for managing file I/O operations.
FileUtils
 
Font
The Font class represents a font file with a specified size and font loader.
FontCharacter
 
FontManager
The FontManager interface provides methods to load and unload fonts.
Form
Enum representing different forms that can be used in rendering.
Global
A static class containing various utility functions and constants.
Global.Platforms
A static class containing platform-specific implementations.
GraphicsManager
The GraphicsManager interface is a wrapper around the platform's graphics API.
ImmutableBreakException
An ImmutableBreakException is thrown when an immutable object changes its properties.
ImmutableColor
ImmutableColor class extends the Color class and provides an immutable version of it.
ImmutableVector2D
ImmutableVector2D class extends Vector2D and provides an immutable version of the Vector2D class.
Input
This class contains enumerations for keyboard keys and mouse buttons.
Input.Key
Enumeration for keyboard keys.
Input.MouseButton
Enumeration for mouse buttons.
Joint2D
 
ObjectAnchor
Enum representing different object anchors for entities.
OnDemandTexture
The OnDemandTexture class extends AbstractTexture and represents a texture that is loaded on demand.
OnDemandTexture.ReturnIOManager
The ReturnIOManager interface provides a method to get the FileIOManager.
OnDemandTexture.ReturnTextureManager
The ReturnTextureManager interface provides a method to get the TextureManager.
OnlyModifiableBeforeCreationException
 
Paint
Paint class for rendering objects with specified attributes.
Pair<F,S>
 
PCInputManager
This interface represents a PC input manager that handles user input from a keyboard and mouse.
PhysicsBody
 
PhysicsSystem
 
PlatformInit
PlatformInit is a class that represents the platform initialization settings.
RectangleMesh
RectangleMesh class extends AbstractRenderable and represents a rectangle mesh object.
Renderable
Represents an object that can be rendered by a Renderer.
Renderer
Represents a renderer that can draw objects.
RevoluteJoint2D
 
SaveManager
 
SaveObject
 
Scene
The Scene class represents a scene in a 2D environment.
SpritesheetTexture
A SpritesheetTexture represents a texture loaded from a spritesheet.
SystemBehavior
An abstract class representing a system.
TextMesh
TextMesh class extends AbstractRenderable and represents a text mesh object.
Texture
The Texture class represents an image texture and provides methods for processing and manipulating it.
TexturedRectangleMesh
A subclass of RectangleMesh that adds the ability to apply a texture to the mesh.
TextureFilter
Enum representing different texture filtering methods.
TextureManager
The TextureManager interface should be implemented by the specific platform running the application, it contains function for manipulation image files.
Transform2D
A class representing the transformation of a 2D object.
Utils
 
Vector2D
Represents a 2D vector, points and sizes.
WorldContactListener
